To auscultate, or examine, with a stethoscope.

In a petrol engine, the period of time the ignition points are closed to let current flow through the ignition coil in between each spark. This is measured as an angle in degrees around the camshaft in the distributor which controls the points, for example in a 4-cylinder engine it might be 55° (spark at 90° intervals, points closed for 55° between each).
To live; to reside.
To linger (on) a particular thought, idea etc.; to remain fixated (on).
To be in a given state.

Of or relating to penance; penitential.

A great surfer.
Showing clever resourcefulness in practical matters.
Artful, tricky or cunning.
Streetwise.

An ancestor.
(grammar) A word, phrase or clause referred to by a pronoun.
The conditional part of a hypothetical proposition, i.e. p \rightarrow q, where p is the antecedent, and q is the consequent.
The first of two subsets of a sequent, consisting of all the sequent's formulae which are valuated as true.
The first term of a ratio, i.e. the term a in the ratio a:b, the other being the consequent.
(chiefly in the plural) Previous principles, conduct, history, etc.
Earlier, either in time or in order.
definitions.example: an antecedent cause

definitions.definition: Presumptive.
definitions.example: an antecedent improbability

definitions.definition: A consultant or consulting firm.
definitions.example: For a PR campaign like never before, one needs a consultancy of unprecedented scope and power.

definitions.definition: The services offered by a consultant.
definitions.example: I've been doing IT consultancy for three years.

definitions.definition: The amount of drug which reaches the site of physiological activity after administration.
definitions.example: poor/low oral bioavailability

definitions.definition: In human sexual behavior, the acts at the beginning of a sexual encounter that serve to build up sexual arousal.
To engage in foreplay.
To release government control of (a business or industry) to private industry.
To make (a variable, etc.) private in scope.
To remove a cover from.
definitions.example: The model railway was uncovered.

definitions.definition: To reveal the identity of.
definitions.example: The murderer has finally been uncovered.

definitions.definition: To show openly; to disclose; to reveal.
To remove one's hat or cap as a mark of respect.
To expose the genitalia.
To expose (lines of formation of troops) successively by the wheeling to right or left of the lines in front.
A carved grotesque figure on a spout which conveys water away from the gutters.
Any decorative carved grotesque figure on a building.
A fictional winged monster.
An ugly woman.
A retailer or distributor who has stocks of a certain type of item for sale.
definitions.example: I need a replacement cartridge but I can't find a stockist.

definitions.definition: To pass laws (including the amending or repeal of existing laws).
Suggestive of or characterized by full, generous, pleasurable sensation.
definitions.example: The plentiful blankets and the voluptuous pillows of the bed called out to my tired body.

definitions.definition: (of a woman) Curvaceous and sexually attractive.
definitions.example: The low neckline of her bodice emphasised her plump, voluptuous figure.

definitions.definition: Uncritically satisfied with oneself or one's achievements; smug.
Apathetic with regard to an apparent need or problem.
A storehouse for maturing wine, a winery.
A store specializing in Hispanic groceries.
Any convenience store.

(Southwestern United States) Any small or medium sized shop with a unique facade in a shopping center plaza, usually located in the center or the sides of the plaza. Does not include the anchor tenant of the shopping center, as they are usually referred to as the anchor.
A warehouse.
Of a person, taking their work seriously and doing it well and rapidly.
A summary; a brief digest.
A short entry of the proceedings of a court; the register containing them; the office containing the register.
A schedule of cases awaiting action in a court.
An agenda of things to be done.
A ticket or label fixed to something, showing its contents or directions to its use.
A receipt.
To enter or inscribe in a docket, or list of causes for trial.
To label a parcel, etc.
definitions.example: to docket goods

definitions.definition: To make a brief abstract of (a writing) and endorse it on the back of the paper, or to endorse the title or contents on the back of; to summarize.
definitions.example: to docket letters and papers

definitions.definition: To make a brief abstract of and inscribe in a book.
definitions.example: judgments regularly docketed

definitions.definition: To trample heavily.
To severely beat someone physically or figuratively.
The act of one who stomps.
In a way that stomps or suggests stomping; stompy; thumping.
definitions.example: a stomping techno track

definitions.definition: A mother of someone's parent.
A female ancestor or progenitor.
